description: Analyzer for BR-03 Leaping Bunny Compliance

Supplier.description: Supplier/company issuing the compliance certificate (header or signature block).

MaterialName.description: Material/raw material name the certificate covers.

MaterialCode.description: Supplier or internal code identifying the material, if printed.

ValidThrough.description: Certificate validity end date or expiration (if provided).

AuthorizedSignatory.description: Name/title of the person signing/authorizing the certificate.

Statement.description: Main cruelty-free declaration text stating no animal testing for the raw material and its components.

Annex1HasAnimalTesting.description: True if Annex 1 lists the raw material, any component(s), or testing organizations as animal-tested; False if Annex 1 is empty or explicitly states none.

IsLeapingBunnyCompliant.description: Overall compliance flag inferred from the certificate content: True if no animal testing is declared and Annex 1 lists none; False otherwise.
